explanation: 每個ServletContextListener的contextInitialized以其在部署描述檔中宣告的順序執行，contextDestroyed則是以相反順序執行
question: ServletContextListeners are invoked in

options.B: contextInitialized and contextDestroyed are invoked in the order in which they are declared in the web.xml
options.C: contextInitialized method are invoked in the order in which they are declared in the web.xml and the contextDestroyed method is invoked in the reverse order in which they are declared in the web.xml
options.D: contextInitialized and contextDestroyed are invoked in the reverse order of which they are declared in the web.xml
